title: Exploring Rust's Reference Counting Mechanism
description: In this lab, we explore the usage of Rc (Reference Counting) in Rust which allows for managing ownership of a value by keeping track of the number of references.

meta.title: Exploring Rust's Reference Counting Mechanism
meta.description: Discover the power of Rust's Rc (Reference Counting) for managing shared ownership and understanding the reference counting mechanism.
meta.keywords: rc, rust playground, programming tutorial, shared ownership, rust tutor, rust online compiler, rust commands, rust practice, rust online, rust online playground
